meaningMnemonic:
This radical is almost the same as the kanji, but it drops the "some" from somebody, making this just a <radical>body</radical>. Like the physical body you're trapped in right now.

Just in case you don't remember the kanji meaning, here's the mnemonic again: Sure, it’s your<radical>self</radical> who’s tumbling down the <radical>slide</radical>… at least that’s how it feels to you. Who are you? What are you? All you know is you’re <kanji>somebody</kanji>, but you don’t know who that somebody is.
